response.original_title: The New York Miseries Part II (Scenes from Life)
response.overview: "Fifteen focumentaries, each about two minutes long, each about some common thing: talking eating, the morning shits, the afternoon fucks with the light coming in, listening to music, getting stoned, singing, etc. Some fantastic crippled beggars doing their routines on 14th St. Several portraits of people. All of them were shot with live sound. This film will go on forever." - Canyon Cinema Catalog #2
response.title: The New York Miseries Part II (Scenes from Life)
